reviews.review_msg: Nice professor, cares a lot about students, but absolutely gargantuan weekly readings. Only assignments are usually a few papers, which he grades harshly, but fair. Take classes only if deeply interested on the subject.

Dr. Kuehn is an extremely qualified, patient, and passionate professor of history who always takes the time to answer difficult questions and attend to students' needs. He is a pleasure to speak with, inside and outside of class, and although he demands a considerable amount of reading for his courses, the texts he selects are essential reading.
